summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3942 for the improvement of West Boston Street, (south side) from Thorndyke Avenue to 26th Avenue West; by constructing Concrete sidewalks, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48102, and lavying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
